title: BillionairesPixelClub

content: https://i.postimg.cc/kM17dK6Z/BPC-billionaires-pixel-club-token-ceo-nocolas-mizo-backround-pixel.jpgBILLIONAIRE PIXEL CLUB [BPC] is the Project Token from one BillionairePixelClub Project 1.000 x 1.000 Pixel = 1.000.000 Pixel total number BPC TOKEN = 1.000.000.000 BPCThe more pixels are paid with BPC, the higher the value of the project token increases. This incentive not only creates a higher reach for the NFT project but also an increase in the overall Attractiveness of the token currency. The marketing function is also supported by the continuous increase in value of the project token another advantage achieved for the NFT project.contract0x62fE5Bb971E9582F544972e5Fc01D8cC27c22Fcfexplorerhttps://bscscan.com/token/0x62fe5bb971e9582f544972e5fc01d8cc27c22fcfsourcecodehttps://github.com/BillionairesPixelClub/sourcecode-BPC/blob/main/v1.1.4whitepaperhttps://github.com/BillionairesPixelClub/whitepaper-BPC/blob/main/WHITEPAPER%20BPC%20v1.1.4.pdftokenomicshttps://github.com/BillionairesPixelClub/tokenomics-BPC/blob/main/tokenimics-BPC-Billionaires-pixel-clup-crypto-nft-project-2024.pngroadmaphttps://github.com/BillionairesPixelClub/roadmap-BPC/blob/main/v1.1.4audithttps://blocksafu.com/audit/0x62fE5Bb971E9582F544972e5Fc01D8cC27c22Fcfhttps://i.postimg.cc/02Dd9jPy/BILLIONAIRES-PIXEL-CLUB-certificate.pngWebsitehttps://www.billionairespixelclub.comofficial Mailcontact@billionairespixelclub.comsupport@billionairespixelclub.comSocialsGithubhttps://github.com/BillionairesPixelClubTwitterhttps://x.com/Bpc_Pixel?t=2CR5-YnZo2o58mMaeatEcg&s=35Telegramhttps://t.me/pixel_BPCReddithttps://www.reddit.com/r/BPCBillionairePixel/Discordhttps://discord.gg/vpcRcnFEE6Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100089218778180Linktreehttps://linktr.ee/billionairespixelclubtiktokhttps://www.tiktok.com/@billionairespixelclub?_t=8jKT4VmkQdM&_r=1youtubehttps://www.youtube.com/@BillionairespixelclubMediumhttps://medium.com/@BillionairesPixelClubBitcointalk ANN Pagehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3528385;sa=showPosts[/center]CEO - comments.author: MostlyGhostly
comments.body: We are soon to be back from vacation skite, and while we are still there we want to get in touch with u remotely, to hash out significant matters on business interaction between our projects. I and Barry, invite u to a conference in a small viet town for a dinner bash, together with our other associates, yet undisclosed but u stay tuned for more business signals from us. We have a proposition, a genuinely authentic and workable plan that we aim to bring in to motion in the weeks to come. I shall keep it top secret as I do not target spooking the semaphore lights out of u but got to warn u beforehand that I am a man-eater. Would u antagonize a short evening dinner with a man-eater?
